snippet.title: Konkwest - Game Reveal Trailer - Arcade Grand Strategy
snippet.description:
The brand new strategy game Konkwest lets you and your friends fight for global dominance! Using its unique simultaneous turn-based game system centered on an easily learnable single-resource economy, Konkwest brings a fresh and surprisingly dynamic flow to the grand strategy genre.

Konkwest is coming to Windows and Android 2024!
The release is planned on Steam and Google Play with further platforms pending evaluation.

Wishlist Konkwest on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2702570/Konkwest/

Join the VCT Games Discord server
https://discord.gg/aRuCEQ3Z3

Follow Konkwest on Instagram @konkwest.game
https://instagram.com/konkwest.game

The music used in this trailer video is by SoundFlakes, found on freesound.org, slightly edited, and in its original version available under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license.
Music: https://freesound.org/people/SoundFlakes/sounds/523339/
License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Disclaimer

Konkwest is a work of fiction. The events portrayed don't reflect our views on global politics and are not meant to offend anyone. Any similarity to real or historical events is purely coincidental. Vincent Creative Technologies does not condone war, violence or discrimination of any kind. Real international conflicts should be resolved peacefully and to the benefit of humankind.
Work in progress; game engine footage. The final product will differ from the media shown.

#gaming #games #indie #civilization #world #conqueror #conquest #game #trailer #konkwest #arcade #grandstrategy #strategy #strategygame #steam
